data.title: Társulat –
data.text:
Member of the Hungarian State Opera: 2013 - 2022

Education and training:

Choreographic School of Vadim Pisarev (school of the Donetsk State Academic Opera and Ballet Theatre)

Competitions:

Serge Lifar International Ballet Competition, Kiev – 2nd Prize (2004); 1st Prize (2006)

International Yury Grigorovich Competition, “Young Ballet of the World”, Sochi – 2nd Prize (2006)

Perm International Ballet Competition – Diploma (2004)

Vaganova-Prix International Ballet Competition, Saint Petersburg – 2nd Prize (2002)

Professional work:

Donetsk Academic Opera and Ballet Theatre – principal

National Opera and Ballet of Kiev – principal

Roles:

Dantzig/Schayk/Tchaikovsky: Swan Lake – Alexander

Eagling/Solymosi/Tchaikovsky: The Nutcracker – Prince, The Nutcracker

Petipa/Vainonen/Tchaikovsky: The Nutcracker – Prince

Petipa/Ivanov/Tchaikovsky: Swan Lake – Prince

Petipa/Tchaikovsky: Sleeping Beauty – Prince Désiré, Bluebird

Petipa/Gorsky/Minkus: La Bayadère – Solor, Golden Idol

Petipa/Gorsky/Minkus: Don Quixote – Basil

Petipa/Adam: Le Corsaire – Ali, Lankedem

Elizariev/Khachaturian: Spartacus – Crassus

Litvinov/Prokofiev: Cinderella – Prince

Bournonville/Løvenskiold: La Sylphide – James

Bournonville/Gielgud/Løvenskiold: La Sylphide – James

Yaremenko/Mozart: The Marriage of Figaro – Figaro

Fokine/Weber: Le spectre de la rose

Clug/Radiohead: Radio and Juliet

Clug/Lazar: Quatro

North/Downes: Troy Game
